name: test_e2e_with_logs[055_SQLI_UNION_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_UNION_003` |
| **Name** | Database information extraction |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | union_based |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' UNION SELECT version(),user(),database() --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20UNION%20SELECT%20version%28%29%2Cuser%28%29%2Cdatabase%28%29%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~29000ms
- **Timestamp**: 05:07:52.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_UNION_003-1767071272152-uj1w7y pattern_id=SQLI_UNION_003 uri=/?q=%27%20UNION%20SELECT%20version%28%29%2Cuser%28%29%2Cdatabase%28%29%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
